directions: Combine the beans, olive oil, vinegar, garlic powder, some salt and pepper and 2 tablespoons cold water in a food processor and blend until smooth. Transfer to a serving bowl, garnish with a drizzle of olive oil and sprinkle with the crushed red pepper. Serve with pita chips.
ingredients: One 15-ounce can white beans or cannellini beans, drained and rinsed
3 tablespoons olive oil, plus more for garnish
Kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper
title: White Bean Dip
